about_the_game:
Battleships Collide: Embark on a Thrilling 3D Space Exploration Adventure!

Immersive Space Shooter Gameplay

Embark on an exhilarating journey through the cosmos as your ship effortlessly navigates warp speed, vanishing into the endless expanse of space.

Customizable Weapon System

Engage in heart-pounding space battles as your ship evades enemy fire and executes lightning-fast maneuvers, disappearing into the void as you outmaneuver your foes.

Sci-Fi Realism & Futuristic Realities

Navigate through a hazardous gauntlet of debris and asteroids at breakneck speeds, skillfully dodging obstacles as your ship races through the cosmos.

Feel the Excitement & Action

Brace for impact as your ship hurtles towards a looming asteroids, unleashing a barrage of firepower to obliterate them into cosmic dust!


Prepare for an interstellar odyssey like no other in this captivating 3D space exploration action-adventure game. As a skilled intergalactic spaceship pilot, you hold the fate of the galaxies in your hands. Engage in epic battles against hostile spacecraft as you defend the galactic federation and journey through the cosmos with your valiant allies.

Highlight:

  • 20 challenging space levels
  • 4 additional weapons to upgrade you spaceship with
  • Dozens of different quests to complete
  • Vast variety of artifacts to collect in space

Brace yourself for heart-pounding excitement and adrenaline-fueled action. Every encounter brings you closer to unraveling the mysteries of the cosmos and cementing your legacy as a legendary space pilot. Engage in intense dogfights, engage in tactical maneuvering, and witness stunning space vistas as you fight for the fate of the galaxy.

Embark on a cosmic adventure that promises uncharted territories, epic battles, and awe-inspiring visuals. Download "Battleships Collide" now and become the hero the galaxies have been waiting for. Your destiny awaits among the stars!

name: Battleships Collide: Space Shooter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 supported GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Battleships Collide: Explore 3D space, defend the galaxy, and conquer 20 intense levels. Customize your spaceship, collect artifacts for hyper space travels in this thrilling shooter game and become the hero galaxies await!
